#define GetX509Attr ( obj,
attr   ) 
Value:
do { \
    Data_Get_Struct((obj), X509_ATTRIBUTE, (attr)); \
    if (!(attr)) { \
        ossl_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "ATTR wasn't initialized!"); \
    } \
} while (0)
